i5.las2peer.p2p

Class PastryNodeImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • i5.las2peer.p2p.Node
      • i5.las2peer.p2p.PastryNodeImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AgentStorage

    public class PastryNodeImpl
extends Node
    A FreePastry implementation of a LAS2peer Node. This class is the actual heart of the p2p based network of interacting nodes an agents in the LAS2peer setting. The package i5.las2peer.p2p.pastry provides all necessary helper classes for the integration (and encapsulation) of the FreePastry library.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PastryNodeImpl.STORAGE_MODE
      Storage mode for the pastry node – either use only memory or the filesystem for stored artifacts.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PastryNodeImpl()
      create a standard node on localhost trying to connect to the standard bootstrap
      PastryNodeImpl(int port, java.lang.String bootstrap)
      create a node listening to the given port an trying to connect to the hosts given in the bootstrap string The bootstrap string may be a comma separated lists of host possibly including port information separated be a colon.
      PastryNodeImpl(int port, java.lang.String bootstrap, PastryNodeImpl.STORAGE_MODE mode)
      create a node listening to the given port an trying to connect to the hosts given in the bootstrap string The bootstrap string may be a comma separated lists of host possibly including port information separated be a colon.

      create a node listening to the given port an trying to connect to the hosts given in the bootstrap string The bootstrap string may be a comma separated lists of host possibly including port information separated be a colon.

      create a node listening to the given port an trying to connect to the hosts given in the bootstrap string The bootstrap string may be a comma separated lists of host possibly including port information separated by a colon.

      • PastryNodeImpl

        public PastryNodeImpl(int port,
                      java.lang.String bootstrap,
                      PastryNodeImpl.STORAGE_MODE mode,
                      boolean monitoringObserver,
                      L2pClassManager cl,
                      java.lang.Long nodeIdSeed)
        create a node listening to the given port an trying to connect to the hosts given in the bootstrap string The bootstrap string may be a comma separated lists of host possibly including port information separated be a colon. Leave empty or null to start a new ring. The observer-flag determines, if the node will be available for monitoring.
        Parameters:
        port -
        bootstrap -
        mode -
        monitoringObserver -
        cl -
        nodeIdSeed -

      • registerReceiver

        public void registerReceiver(MessageReceiver receiver)
                      throws AgentAlreadyRegisteredException,
                             L2pSecurityException,
                             AgentException
        Description copied from class: Node
        Registers a (local) Agent for usage through this node. The Agent has to be unlocked before registration.
        Overrides:
        registerReceiver in class Node
        Throws:
        AgentAlreadyRegisteredException - the given agent is already registered to this node
        L2pSecurityException - the agent is not unlocked
        AgentException - any problem with the agent itself (probably on calling Agent.notifyRegistrationTo(i5.las2peer.p2p.Node)

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(Message message,
                        MessageResultListener listener,
                        Node.SendMode mode)
        Description copied from class: Node
        Sends a message, recipient and sender are stated in the message. Depending on the mode, either all nodes running the given agent will be notified of this message, or only a random one. NOTE: Pastry nodes will always use broadcast at the moment!
        Specified by:
        sendMessage in class Node
        Parameters:
        message - the message to send
        listener - a listener for getting the result separately
        mode - is it a broadcast or an any-cast message?

                                       throws AgentNotKnownException
        Description copied from class: Node

        Parameters:
        agentId - id of the agent to look for
        hintOfExpectedCount - a hint for the expected number of results (e.g. to wait for)

               throws AgentNotKnownException

        Gets an agent description from the net. make sure, always to return fresh versions of the requested agent, so that no thread can unlock the private key for another one!
